получение вашего ника (с помощью [nickid()] - его нельзя будет получить)
getting your nickname (using [nickid()] - it will not be possible to get it)

if string.find(sampGetPlayerNickname(select(2, sampGetPlayerIdByCharHandle(playerPed))), "_") ~= nil then return string.match(sampGetPlayerNickname(select(2, sampGetPlayerIdByCharHandle(playerPed))), ".*", string.find(sampGetPlayerNickname(select(2, sampGetPlayerIdByCharHandle(playerPed))), "_") + 1) else return "{my_surname}" end
outputs the text of the dialog
displays the title of the dialog

if getCityPlayerIsIn(playerPed) == 1 then return "Los-Santos" elseif getCityPlayerIsIn(playerPed) == 2 then return "San-Fierro" elseif getCityPlayerIsIn(playerPed) == 3 then return "Las-Venturas" elseif getCityPlayerIsIn(playerPed) == 0 then return "San-Andreas" end
выводит район в котором вы находитесь (Los-Santos, San-Fierro, Las-Venturas, San-Andres)
displays the area where you are located (Los-Santos, San-Fierro, Las-Venturas, San-Andres)
выводит id оружия которое находиться в руках
outputs the id of the weapon that is in the hands of
выводит количество патронов оружия которое находиться в ваших руках
displays the number of rounds of the weapon that is in your hands
outputs the id of the nearest transport

if math.ceil((getCharCoordinates(playerPed) * - 1 + 3000) / 250) >= 1 and math.ceil((getCharCoordinates(playerPed) * - 1 + 3000) / 250) <= 24 then return squares[math.ceil((getCharCoordinates(playerPed) * - 1 + 3000) / 250)] .."-".. math.ceil((select(2, getCharCoordinates(playerPed)) + 3000) / 250) else return "{square}" end
выводит квадрат, в котором вы находитесь
outputs the square you are in
выводит название района на русском, в котором вы находитесь
displays the name of the area in Russian where you are located
выводит название района на английском, в котором вы находитесь
displays the name of the area in English where you are located

if sampGetVehicleIdByCarHandle(select(2, sampGetCarHandleBySampVehicleId(getClosestCarId()))) and sampGetPlayerIdByCharHandle(getDriverOfCar(select(2, sampGetCarHandleBySampVehicleId(getClosestCarId())))) then return select(2, sampGetPlayerIdByCharHandle(getDriverOfCar(select(2, sampGetCarHandleBySampVehicleId(getClosestCarId()))))) else return "{car_driverid_nearest}" end
outputs the id of the driver of the nearest transport
выводит id ближайшего к вам игрока
outputs the id of the player closest to you
displays the player in the center of the screen
выводит id ближайшего к вам игрока, если его цвет ника различен с вашем
outputs the id of the player closest to you if his nickname color is different from your

if sampGetPlayerIdByCharHandle(select(2, getCharPlayerIsTargeting(playerHandle))) then return select(2, sampGetPlayerIdByCharHandle(select(2, getCharPlayerIsTargeting(playerHandle)))) else return oldtargetid and oldtargetid or "{player_id_target}" end
выводит id игрока на которого вы навелись
outputs the id of the player you are targeting
выводит количество игроков в зоне стрима
displays the number of players in the stream zone
выводит количество машин в зоне стрима
displays the number of machines in the stream zone
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return getCarSpeed(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed)) else return "{my_car_speed}" end
displays the speed of your transport
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return getCarModel(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed)) else return "{my_car_model}" end
outputs the model of your transport
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return getCarColours(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed)) else return "{my_car_color1}" end
displays the color №1 of your transport
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return select(2, getCarColours(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed))) else return "{my_car_color2}" end
displays the color №2 of your transport
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return getCarHealth(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed)) else return "{my_car_hp}" end
outputs the hp of your transport
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return getCarCoordinates(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed)) else return "{my_car_X}" end
outputs the X coordinate of your transport
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return select(2, getCarCoordinates(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed))) else return "{my_car_Y}" end
outputs the Y coordinate of your transport
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return select(3, getCarCoordinates(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed))) else return "{my_car_Z}" end
outputs the Z coordinate of your transport

if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) and getCarModel(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed)) <= 611 then return getNameOfVehicleModel(getCarModel(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed))) else return "{my_car_name_model}" end
outputs the name of your transport
if isCharInAnyCar(playerPed) then return select(2, sampGetVehicleIdByCarHandle(storeCarCharIsInNoSave(playerPed))) else return "{my_car_id}" end
outputs the id of your transport
выводит сторону света на которую смотрит игрок
outputs the side of the world the player is looking at
if text:match("%[player_skin_nearest%((.-)%)%]") then return getClosestPlayerId("skin", tonumber(text:match("%[player_skin_nearest%((.-)%)%]"))) else return "[player_skin_nearest(number)]" end
выводит ближайшего к вам игрока с выбранным вами скином (number - скин)
displays the player closest to you with the skin you selected (number - skin)

idcar, passenger = text:match("%[car_passenger_seat_playerid%((.-),(.-)%)%]") if sampGetCarHandleBySampVehicleId(idcar) and not isCarPassengerSeatFree(select(2, sampGetCarHandleBySampVehicleId(idcar)), passenger) then return select(2, sampGetPlayerIdByCharHandle(getCharInCarPassengerSeat(select(2, sampGetCarHandleBySampVehicleId(idcar)), passenger))) else return "[car_passenger_seat_playerid(idcar,passenger)]" end
textsearch, search = text:match("%[match%((.*),(.*)%)%]") if textsearch and search then return textsearch:match(search) else return "[match(text,textsearch)]" end
выводит из текста указанное вами значение (text - сам текст, search - значение)
outputs the value you specified from the text (text is the text itself, search is the value)
if text:match("%[ping%((.-)%)%]") then return sampGetPlayerPing(text:match("%[ping%((.-)%)%]")) else return "[ping(id)]" end
выводит пинг игрока (number это id игрока)
outputs the player's ping (number is the player's id)
if text:match("%[lvl%((.-)%)%]") then return sampGetPlayerScore(text:match("%[lvl%((.-)%)%]")) else return "[lvl(id)]" end
выводит лвл игрока (number - id игрока, переменная не сможет вывести ваш лвл)
outputs the lvl of the player (number is the id of the player, the variable will not be able to output your lvl)

if text:match("%[nickid%((.-)%)%]") then if sampIsPlayerConnected(text:match("%[nickid%((.-)%)%]")) then return sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[nickid%((.-)%)%]")) else return "[nickid(id)]" end else return "[nickid(id)]" end
выводит ник игрока (number это id игрока)
displays the player's nickname (number is the player's id)

if text:match("%[rpnickid%((.-)%)%]") then if sampIsPlayerConnected(text:match("%[rpnickid%((.-)%)%]")) then return string.gsub(sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[rpnickid%((.-)%)%]")), "_", " ") else return "[rpnickid(id)]" end else return "[rpnickid(id)]" end
выводит рп ники (number id - id игрока, переменная не сможет вывести ваш ник)
if text:match("%[removecolor%((.-)%)%]") then return string.gsub(text:match("%[removecolor%((.-)%)%]"), "{......}", "") else return "[removecolor(text)]" end
убирает все значения в тексте по типу {FFFFFF}
removes all values in the text by type {FFFFFF}
if text:match("%[random%((.-)%)%]") then return math.random(text:match("%[random%((.-)%)%]")) else return "[random(number)]" end
выводит рандомное число (number - до какова число)
output a random number (number - up to any number)

if sampIsPlayerConnected(text:match("%[nameid%((.-)%)%]")) then if sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[nameid%((.-)%)%]")):find("%w+_%w+") then return string.gsub(sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[nameid%((.-)%)%]")), string.match(sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[nameid%((.-)%)%]")), ".*", string.find(sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[nameid%((.-)%)%]")), "_")), "") else return "[nameid(id)]" end else return "[nameid(id)]" end
выводит имя игрока по его id (number - id)
outputs the player's name by his id (number - id)

if sampIsPlayerConnected(text:match("%[surnameid%((.-)%)%]")) then if sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[surnameid%((.-)%)%]")):find("%w+_%w+") then return string.match(sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[surnameid%((.-)%)%]")), ".*", string.find(sampGetPlayerNickname(text:match("%[surnameid%((.-)%)%]")), "_") + 1) else return "[surnameid(id)]" end else return "[surnameid(id)]" end
выводит фамилию игрока по его id (number - id)
outputs the last name of the player by his id (number - id)
if text:match("%[car_model%((.-)%)%]") then return getCarModel(select(2, sampGetCarHandleBySampVehicleId(text:match("%[car_model%((.-)%)%]")))) else return "[car_model(idcar)]" end
outputs the transport model (number - ID of the transport)

if text:match("%[car_name_model%((.-)%)%]") then if tonumber(text:match("%[car_name_model%((.-)%)%]")) <= 611 then return getNameOfVehicleModel(getCarModel(select(2, sampGetCarHandleBySampVehicleId(text:match("%[car_name_model%((.-)%)%]"))))) else return "[car_name_model(idcar)]" end else return "[car_name_model(idcar)]" end
выводит название модели транспорта (number - айди транспорта)
outputs the name of the transport model (number - ID of the transport)

if text:match("%[player_skin_nearest_all%((.-)%)%]") then return getClosestPlayerSkinAll(tonumber(text:match("%[player_skin_nearest_all%((.-)%)%]"))) else return "[player_skin_nearest_all(number)]" end
выводит количество игроков в радиусе с скином (number - скин)
displays the number of players in a radius with a skin (number - skin)

if text:match("%[textdraw_id_text%((.-)%)%]") then if sampTextdrawIsExists(text:match("%[textdraw_id_text%((.-)%)%]")) then return sampTextdrawGetString(text:match("%[textdraw_id_text%((.-)%)%]")) else return "[textdraw_id_text(idtexdraw)]" end else return "[textdraw_id_text(idtexdraw)]" end
выводит текст тексдрава, по его id (number - id текстдрава)
outputs the text of the textdraw, by its id (number - id of the textdraw)

if text:match("%[3dtext_id_text%((.-)%)%]") then if sampIs3dTextDefined(text:match("%[3dtext_id_text%((.-)%)%]")) then return tostring(select(1, sampGet3dTextInfoById(text:match("%[3dtext_id_text%((.-)%)%]")))) else return "[3dtext_id_text(id3dtext)]" end else return "[3dtext_id_text(id3dtext)]" end
выводит текст 3dtext, по его id (number - id 3dtext)
outputs 3dtext text, by its ID (number - id 3dtext)

if text:match("%[color_player%((.-)%)%]") then return "{ " .. ("%06X"):format(bit.band(sampGetPlayerColor(text:match("%[color_player%((.-)%)%]")), 0xFFFFFF)) .. " }" else return "[color_player(id)]" end
выводит цвет игрока по его id
displays a player's colour by his id
выводит список игроков с цветом (number - цвет), до 50 игроков
displays a list of players with color (number - color), up to 50 players
displays the color of the player (number - id of the player)
выводит id игрока по его нику (number - id игрока)
outputs the player id by his nickname (number - player id)
if sampIsPlayerConnected(tonumber(text:match("%[online_player%((.-)%)%]"))) and tonumber(text:match("%[online_player%((.-)%)%]")) ~= nil then return "[Online]" else return "[Offline]" end
проверяет онлайн ли игрок (number - id игрока)
checks if the player is online (number - id of the player)
